content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 1, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 1, Barcelona 1.
Attempt missed. Raúl Rodríguez (Espanyol) header from the left side of the six yard box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Joan Verdú with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Kiko Casilla (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.
Attempt blocked. Pedro (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Juan Forlín (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Jordi Amat (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Jordi Amat (Espanyol).
Sergio García (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Espanyol 1, Barcelona 1. Álvaro Vázquez (Espanyol) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Thievy with a headed pass.
Substitution, Barcelona. Seydou Keita replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Offside, Barcelona. Dani Alves tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Raúl Rodríguez.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Espanyol. Kiko Casilla replaces Cristian Álvarez because of an injury.
Delay in match Cristian Álvarez (Espanyol) because of an injury.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right. Assisted by Pedro with a cross.
Álvaro Vázquez (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
